approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF NFS server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to V-KYC team leads and Process Managers.
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be searchable by date and month.
An option to upload an Excel or text file with LAN IDs should be available for bulk download.
The system should process the uploaded file and trigger a call to the backend API.
Results of the bulk download should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should display 10 records per page.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time during bulk download.
The file upload should accept CSV/TXT files.
The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Search functionality by date and month.
Bulk download functionality via file upload.
Display of recording details in a tabular format.
Download All option for bulk download.
non_functional_requirements: The access to the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)
success_criteria: V-KYC team leads can easily access and download recordings.
Reduced dependency on IT for recording retrieval.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF NFS server.
Bulk download limited to 50 LAN IDs per file.
Table pagination will display only 10 records at a time, and similarly only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
assumptions: The backend API for processing requests exists or will be developed.
The necessary infrastructure is in place.
risks: Network issues affecting access to the NFS server.
API performance issues during bulk download.

recommendations: Add details regarding the backend API.
Specify the security measures for the portal.

recommendations_for_completion: Provide detailed specifications for the backend API.
Define security protocols for the portal.
